content.text: From July 30 to July 31, 2025, the elizaOS/eliza repository showed active development with 2 new pull requests (with 1 successfully merged), 4 new issues opened, and involvement from 6 active contributors during this period.

Issue #5691 titled 'Some migrated plugins for 1.x are missing auto-deployment CI files and not deployed' by @linear is OPEN with 1 comment, highlighting deployment configuration issues for migrated plugins.

Issues #5645, #5646, #5647, and #5648 by @linear for the clanker, aave, defi-llama, and moon-well plugins respectively were all CLOSED on July 30, 2025, likely resolved as part of addressing the plugin deployment issues.
PR #5689 titled 'Fix subprocess mocks and ci path in tests' by @wtfsayo is open
PR #5692 titled 'Refactor plugin.ts to use functional patterns' by @HashWarlock is open
PR #5681 titled 'docs: standardize all documentation to use bun:test exclusively' is merged
The repository elizaOS/eliza has a list of top contributors, though specific contributor details are not provided in the input.
